name: Ambient World
description:
Explore multiple maps that has endless terrains.

AmbientWorld is a relaxing open world game, developed to keep music as the main feature of it. Currently only one map has a short story, I'll try to add more maps and story in future updates.

You and 3 other people woke up in this strange place, play Flower Of Darkness map to explore the mystery of that world.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D: Walk
  • Left Alt: Show Mouse Cursor
  • Left Ctrl: Walk Slowly
  • Left Shift/Right Click: Sprint
  • Esc: Pause

Tips:

  • Press 0 to increase walk speed.
  • In Flower of Darkness map, follow white light to view story.
  • Photos are saved in user's /AppData/Local/AmbientWorldBeta/Saved/Screenshots/
  • Change world style, time in World Settings option.

Tested On:

  • RAM: 16 GB
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Space Required: 1.1 GB

Install Instruction:

  • Extract the AmbientWorld.rar and
  • Run AmbientWorldBeta.exe
  • Enjoy !!!
